title: Was Betsy Ross a Quaker Who Was Opposed to Slavery?
subtitle: The so-called "Betsy Ross flag" has become a recent point of controversy in connection with white supremacy and raised questions about Ross herself.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: Betsy Ross made the first American flag (or one of the first American flags), known as the "Betsy Ross flag," and was a Quaker who opposed slavery.
